group_1.narration: There's something big happening in Kamihama.@But...
I have no idea what it is!
It's not that I slacked off on@my research or anything like that.@I guess it's more like I thought I shouldn't@go in with too much prior knowledge.@Like, I shouldn't have any preconceptions...
In any case!@SOMETHING has happened here!
We'll put the nitty gritty aside for now.@The Kamihama I'm in now is the one@after that whole mess got resolved.

group_1.textLeft: What do you think of this Mami Tomoe and @me?
Why did I even ask. I wasted my breath.

group_1.narration: There's a lot of tricky things to keep in@mind when getting close to Mami Tomoe.
If I were to show up in Mitakihara, there@might be unpredictable side effects...@I'm totally aware of that.@So I can only approach her in Kamihama...
And if she ever finds out about@my identity as a Magical Girl...

group_1.textLeft: What a pain in the neck.
And there he goes again, running off.@Geeze...

group_1.textCenter: (There are some things I can't do, but this@is something that needs to be done.)
(I remember her magic from the last time we@met.)

group_1.narration: Time for the encore to@my amazing performace!

group_1.textRight: Wh-whoa! You're that nice lady from before!

group_1.textLeft: Oh... That girl who fell down the other@day...

group_1.textRight: Hey there! Please allow me to convey my@gratitude with respect to your service!
What is obfuscating your time right now?@Er, what is occluding your time right now?
Wanna play with me? C'mon, let's play!
(I'll dive right into her heart with this!)
